show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #16 Doniga Markegard "Marketing Through Connections"
subtitle: #16 Doniga Markegard "Marketing Through Connections"
summary:
This week Doniga Markegard joins us to share her unique perspective from Ranching around the Bay area in California on the Coastal Terrace Prairie.

Instagram @dawn.again
